H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H4194.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living

H3077.def: = man; ► father of {L:Benaiah<SDBH:בְּנָיָהוּ>}, warrior, later army commander of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H5647.def: = state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations

H842.def: = female deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites, and symbolized with a wooden pole

H6091.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ► functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H7110.def: = process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5749.def: = action with which a person gives evidence or proof of something, often as a witness in a legal setting ► the witness can be favorable or unfavorable

H238.def: = to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3847.def: = state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H4251.def: = state in which humans lack physical strength, ◄ caused by sickness or injury

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H7194.def: = process by which separate objects being joined together to form one unit

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H3075.def: = man, also known as {L:Zabad<SDBH:זָבָד>}; ► son of {L:Shimeath<SDBH:שִׁמְעָת>}, an {L:Ammonite<SDBH:עַמֹּונִי>} woman; ► he was a servant of {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}, king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, who murdered his master with the help of {L:Jehozabad<SDBH:יְהֹוזָבָד>}, son of {L:Shimrith<SDBH:שִׁמְרִית>}; both were later killed by {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}' successor {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}

H4853.def: literally: lifting up (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans turn to (other) humans with the confidence that they will find joy and comfort there

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4097.def: = a written account of an event or range of events, often accompanied by annotations and opinions

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
